sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
extends for a particular distance
, se nadaljuje do določene razdalje.

seg.quote: The road now extends two kilometres beyond the River.

sense.def:
Če neki predmet
extends from a surface
, štrli z neke površine.

Če dogodek ali dejavnost
extends for a period of time
, se nadaljuje določeno obdobje.

seg.quote: His working day often extends well into the evening.

sense.def:
Če položaj
extends to particular people or things
, vpliva na določene osebe ali stvari.

seg.quote: The consequences of unemployment extend well beyond the labour market.

sense.def:
To extend something
pomeni nekaj narediti večje ali doseči, da dlje traja ali več zajame.

seg.quote: Have you ever thought of extending your house?
Congress wants the law extended to cover all states.

sense.def:
To extend a part of one's body
pomeni zravnati ali iztegniti del telesa.

seg.quote: He extended his hand, and Brody shook it.

sense.def:
To extend an offer or invitation to someone
pomeni nekomu dati ponudbo ali povabilo;
